name: Computer Game
description:
Hello! I am the person who made this "Game".

I started this project on OCT, 19th, 2021.

I can't believe it took so long to make!

Well despite that, I hope you enjoy the game.

I can definitely say I'm very happy with

how it turned out!

If you want to see more of the garbage I've made,

 check out my YouTube channel.

"Elijah rulz" https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQ6Pfwg1QcBrOe-5sbpaNRg

I'll be uploading the soundtrack

there. So if you want to listen
to it, go there.

I've also decided I will release the

project file for this game if

every secret has been found.

So if you find a secret, upload it to

YouTube or something.

This game also has 5 endings!

So I hope you try to get every ending!
